td.content: The patient was found to have Anemia and Dr Seven and his staff diagnosed the condition and treated Ms Rebecca for Anemia during the 2 day stay at Community Health Hospitals. Ms Rebecca recovered from Anemia during the stay and is being discharged in a stable condition. If there is fever greater than 101.5 F or onset of chest pain/breathlessness the patient is advised to contact emergency.

tr.td: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week for Follow up with Outpatient facility for Immunosuppressive therapy.
